title: Giants fire HC Joe Judge, Travesty in Super Wild Card Weekend? Patriots and Bills rematch, Fantasy Awards, and can Jimmy Garoppolo deliver?
itunes:title: Giants fire HC Joe Judge, Travesty in Super Wild Card Weekend? Patriots and Bills rematch, Fantasy Awards, and can Jimmy Garoppolo deliver?
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Fmr Pro Bowl RB Maurice Jones-Drew discuss the Giants deciding to move on from HC Joe Judge and first turning their attention to finding a GM. What kind of person is needed in NY to move the Giants forward quickly? Kay asks which team losing this weekend would be a travesty and how much will the earlier matchups between the Patriots and Bills matter in this installment? We get the first of our Fantasy Football Awards before taking a look at the impact that QB Jimmy Garoppolo will have on the 49ers-Cowboys matchup on Sunday.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
